tool_description: Estimates bird size and physical proportions from photographs or field observations using reference objects and comparative analysis.

reference_objects.description: Known objects in image for size comparison

estimated_length.description: Estimated total body length in centimeters

relative_size.description: Size comparison: sparrow_sized, robin_sized, crow_sized, hawk_sized

error_messages: Invalid size measurements: Length and wingspan must be positive numbers.
Unknown relative size: Use one of [sparrow_sized, robin_sized, crow_sized, hawk_sized].
Insufficient size data: Provide at least one size parameter for analysis.
usage: Provide any combination of reference_objects, estimated_length, wingspan_estimate, or relative_size. Returns standardized size analysis for species matching.

length_range.description: Estimated length range [min, max] in centimeters

wingspan_range.description: Estimated wingspan range [min, max] in centimeters
